raw_answer.rationale: Numeric values printed near bars disagree with the bar sizes, indicating the chart is misrepresenting the data.

trace.model_output_excerpt:
THOUGHT: The chart is a annotated bar chart with printed values near bars. According to guidelines, I should check for misrepresentation using bar_value_consistency to see if bar sizes align with the printed numbers. I will run the appropriate tool to test this.

ACTION: {"tool":"bar_value_consistency","args":{"image":{"$ref":"input.image"},"bar_orientation":"horizontal"}}
